WEATHER APP

Kotlin | Android

This Android weather app allows users to easily check the current weather conditions of any city. With a simple and intuitive interface, users can enter the name of a city and instantly receive accurate weather information. Powered by the OpenWeatherMap API, the app fetches real-time weather data, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and more. The app's efficient design ensures a seamless user experience, making it a handy tool for staying informed about the weather no matter where you are.
